description:
The best all-in-one screen recorder and video editor. Record your screen, add video effects, transitions and more.

Camtasia is a video-based screen capture program that enables users to demonstrate and communicate ideas or share knowledge using video. From quick video demos to extensive video projects, Camtasia has a wide range of editing tools to create video content from a variety of sources. Users can record from webcam or screen, introduce a variety of effects, and easily share videos over multiple channels.
Feature Updates
- Use a horizontal layout for the Camtasia Rev window for consistency with Camtasia Online.
- Added option in Camtasia Rev to choose between Rev Media and Unpacked Media after recording.
- Added app icons and tooltips to selection menu for window capture.
- Added import support for WebM: VP8 video with vorbis audio, and VP9 video with opus audio.
- The Camtasia Rev Export options in the dropdown are now accessible with keyboard navigation.
- User can change the asset downloads folder from the Preferences dialog.
Performance Improvements
- Reduce the amount of closed caption objects that can get created while splitting and cutting along the timeline to help performance in projects with many captions.
Updates for IT Administrators
- Added ability to restrict sign-in options via the Deployment tool.
- Removed option for enterprise users to sign in to the application from the File menu.
Bug Fixes
- Fixed bug where deleting an animation created by Smart Focus could unexpectedly adjust the media crop size.
- Fixed Corner Rounding button being incorrectly unchecked on first launch.
- Fixed bug that clicking Device Frame Effect doesn't show any properties.
- Fixed a bug with SmartPlayer presets in the Batch Export window.
- Fixed an issue where Camtasia might ignore certain events on startup if multiple events occurred at the same time.
- Fixed an issue that could cause some decoded HEVC video frames to be delivered out-of-order.
- Fixed an issue that could cause the export save location dialog to get lost behind the exporter dialog.
- Fixed a crash that could occur when attempting to record a window that was missing certain metadata.
